name: Left My Phone At Work
description:
This game was developed for the 2018 Epic MegaJam, which is also the first ever jam this team has been a part of (talk about ambitious!). As per the title, you are playing as someone who left their phone at work and has to get it back after hours.

Lost Phone Team-

Rhianydd Jenkins

Peter Wiltshire

Bronwen Palmer

Ben Walters-Evans

Lyna Dewit

We are all first year students studying Games Design at University of South Wales
